channel.title: Home on Ed's Auto Detailing
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Ed's Auto Detailing

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Have a question, or want to set up an appointment? Give us a shout we're easy to reach. phone 207-213-7547 email contact@edsautodetailing.com

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: How do you quote details? We quote based off vehicle size, and condition. Since it can be difficult to assess the condition of the vehicle over the phone we'll give you a price range of what the cost could be. Upon seeing the vehicle we can give an absolute amount and promise not to raise the price after completing the job. All quotes are valid for 30 days. Do you accept credit cards?

item.title: Location
item.description: Conveniently located between the Gardiner Car And Truck Wash and Dave's Dinner off Brunswick Ave we're hard to miss.
